Home page: http://www.stl.unitedway.org
GenNext (young professionals who want to volunteer): http://www.gennextstl.org
Young Leaders (40 somethings and under who donate $1,000 or more annually to United Way of Greater St. Louis, Inc.): http://www.stl.unitedway.org/GetInvolved/Leadership/yls.aspx
Who we help: http://www.stl.unitedway.org/WhoWeHelp/stories.aspx
- - - - - - - -
For more than 80 years, our United Way has brought people together to care for one another. We raise funds, mobilize volunteers, help to strengthen agencies, identify critical and unmet needs in the community, and help to build collaborations with the public and private sector to meet those needs.
Through our annual campaign we raise funds to support a network of nearly 200 local health and human service organizations in our 16-county Missouri and Illinois region.
More than 90 cents of every dollar your United Way receives helps people in our community. Rigorous examination of member agencies – from program results to governance to overall quality – not only helps determine funding, it also ensures that agencies are meeting the needs of your friends, neighbors, co-workers – perhaps even your family.
1. United Way is the most effective way to strengthen health and human services in the St. Louis metro area.
cause.mission: The United Way of Greater St. Louis unites people of diverse backgrounds and interests who work together to strengthen health and human services in Missouri and Illinois.
cause.name: United Way of Greater St. Louis
